title: The Queen Has Rabies
description:
Jacob Weisberg talks to Professor Timothy Garton Ash about what free speech looks like in the electorate and in the media in the age of Trump. Plus, are we in for a Brexit type of surprise of November 8th?
Trumpcast is brought to you by Boll and Branch. For luxury bedding at a low price, go to BollandBranch.com and use promo code trumpcast to get 50 dollars off your first set of sheets.
